sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.pdInvFormulaSelect')" @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form ref="productBnftForm" :model="productBnftForm" label-width="auto">
      <cus-form-title :first="true" :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.invFormulaSelect')"></cus-form-title>
      <el-row :gutter="20" class="row-bg" justify="center" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('pdDiscountFormulaSelect.productDetailsType')">
            <cus-select v-model="productBnftForm.productType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.appointedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointProduct" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable @change="appointFindInv">
              <el-option v-for="item in productOptionList" :key="item.id" :label="item.pdCode+':'+item.pdName"
                         :value="item.id">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.appointedInv')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointPdInv" clearable filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in invOptions2" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="20" class="row-bg" justify="center" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')" prop="ruleType">
            <cus-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointRuleType" codetype="ruleBusinessDetailClass" disabled
                        filter="1$32"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')">
            <el-input v-model="productBnftForm.appointCalcCode" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item style="text-align: right">
            <el-button icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch">
              {{ $t('table.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.invFormula')"/>

    <el-table ref="ruleTable" :data="ruleTable" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit
              highlight-current-row max-height="300" size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filters_method" :filters="filters_pdCode" :label="$t('rule.product')"
                       align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCode ? scope.row.pdCode + ':' + scope.row.pdName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.pdInvType')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdInvType | filter_pdInvType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('invFormulaSelect.invItem')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdInvCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdInvCode ? scope.row.pdInvCode + ':' + scope.row.pdInvName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'invAmountFormul:associate'" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('form.select') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="ruleTable" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5" :params="params"
                    url="/invAmountFormul/base/findAllAmountFormula"/>

    <!-- 规则引擎公式定义弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-definition :attributeObj="attributeObj" :ruleDefinitionClosed="ruleModuleClosed"
                         :visible="formulaVisible"></cus-rule-definition>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="'1'" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {associate, findAllProductByDetailType, getInvByCode} from "@/api/basicinfo/invAmountFormula"
import {findInvBypdInvType} from '@/api/basicinfo/pdtemppdinv'

let _this

export default {
  name: 'invFormulaSelect',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('pdCalcBussType', code)
    },
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    },
    filter_pdInvType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('pdinvtype', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    guaranteeDetails: {
      type: String,
      default: undefined
    },
    calculationFormulaType: {
      type: String,
      default: undefined
    },
    pdUwSiTypeOptions: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
    },
    pdUwSiTypeDtOptions: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: undefined
    }
  },
  watch: {
    ruleTable() {
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      this.ruleTable.forEach(val => {
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), val.pdCode)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push({
            text: val.pdCode + ':' + val.pdName,
            value: val.pdCode
          })
        }
      })
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      filters_pdCode: [],
      formulaVisible: false,
      attributeObj: {},
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      form_rule: {
        ruleBussModuDeta: '',
        description: ''
      },
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        current_pdBussId: undefined,
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        eq_pdInvId: undefined,
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      pdUwSiType: '',
      tableData_formula: [],
      productOptionList: [],//产品数组
      invOptions: [],
      invOptions2: [],
      Options2: [],
      Options3: [],//指定收益数组
      Options4: [],//指定收益明细数组
      ruleTable: [],
      productBnftForm: {
        pdInv: '',
        appointPdInv: undefined,
        appointRuleType: '',
        appointProduct: '',
        appointCalcCode: '',
        ruleType: '',
        pdInvType: '',
        product: '',
        productType: '',
        productBigType: ''
      },
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      }
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    await getInvByCode(this.pdUwSiTypeOptions).then(response => {
      const pdtempPdInv = response.data
      this.params.current_pdBussId = pdtempPdInv.id
    })
    this.productBnftForm.product = this.product.pdCode + ":" + this.product.id
    this.productBnftForm.pdInvType = this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions
    this.productBnftForm.ruleType = this.calculationFormulaType
    this.productBnftForm.appointRuleType = this.calculationFormulaType
    this.findInv(this.productBnftForm.pdInvType)
    this.productBnftForm.pdInv = this.pdUwSiTypeOptions
  },
  created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
  },
  methods: {
    ruleModuleClosed() {
      this.formulaVisible = false
      this.handleSearch()
    },
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    //收益信息
    findInv(val) {
      let paramsinv = {
        productId: this.product.id,
        pdInvType: val
      }
      findInvBypdInvType(paramsinv).then(res => {
        this.invOptions = []
        res.data.forEach(inv => {
          this.invOptions.push({
            value: inv.pdInvCode,
            label: inv.pdInvCode + ':' + inv.pdInvName,
            entity: inv
          })
        })
      })
    },
    //显示指定收益项数组
    appointFindInv(val) {
      this.productBnftForm.appointPdInv = undefined
      this.invOptions2 = []
      if (!val) {
        return
      }
      let paramsinv = {
        productId: val,
        pdInvType: this.pdUwSiTypeDtOptions
      }
      findInvBypdInvType(paramsinv).then(res => {
        res.data.forEach(inv => {
          this.invOptions2.push({
            value: inv.id,
            label: inv.pdInvCode + ':' + inv.pdInvName
          })
        })
      })
    },
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      this.params.eq_productDetailType = val
      this.productBnftForm.appointProduct = ''
      this.productOptionList = []
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = response.data
      })
    },
    getCaption(obj, state) {
      const index = obj.lastIndexOf(":")
      if (state === 0) {
        return obj.substring(0, index)
      } else {
        return obj.substring(index + 1, obj.length)
      }
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
        this.params.product = pdtempPdInfo
        this.productBnftForm.productType = this.product.cType
        this.productBnftForm.productBigType = this.product.bType
        this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.product.cType
        this.productDetailTypeChanged(this.productBnftForm.productType)
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_invFormulaSelect', false)
    },
    handleSearch() {
      //分页传输数据
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = this.productBnftForm.appointProduct
      this.params.eq_pdInvId = this.productBnftForm.appointPdInv
      this.params.like_pdCalcCode = this.productBnftForm.appointCalcCode
      this.$refs.page.reload()
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let PdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: this.guaranteeDetails,
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        pdBussId: '',
        pdBussCode: '',
        pdStructureType: '07',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      if (this.productBnftForm.pdInv !== undefined) {
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode = this.productBnftForm.pdInv
        for (const inv of this.invOptions) {
          if (inv.entity.pdInvCode === this.productBnftForm.pdInv) {
            PdtempPdCalc.pdBussId = inv.entity.id
            break
          }
        }
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: PdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: this.guaranteeDetails,
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let flag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (flag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.handleSearch()
          this.$emit('bringCalcCode', pdtempPdCalc.pdBussId, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.handleSearch()
              this.$emit('bringCalcCode', pdtempPdCalc.pdBussId, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
